table.title: Only Knowledge objects on both stacks

search.query: | inputlookup $lookup$_all_saved_searches_src.csv | eval src = "true" | rename eai:acl.app as src_APP, eai:acl.owner as src_OWNER, eai:acl.sharing as src_SHARING, search as src_search | append [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | fields eai:acl.app title eai:acl.owner eai:acl.sharing, search | rename eai:acl.app as dest_APP, eai:acl.owner as dest_OWNER, eai:acl.sharing as dest_SHARING, search as dest_search | eval dest="true"] | stats values(*) as * by title | eval src = if(isnull(src), "false", src), dest = if(isnull(dest), "false", dest) | search dest="true" src="true" | fields title, *_APP, *_search | eval equal = if(src_search==dest_search,1,0) | search equal=$equal$
